properties.areaDesc: Shasta Lake Area / Northern Shasta County
properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 8 at 2:30AM PST until January 9 at 7:00AM PST by NWS Sacramento CA
properties.description:
* WHAT...Snow expected. Plan on difficult travel conditions. Total
snow accumulations of 4 to 8 inches, with localized amounts up
to a foot over the peaks, are expected.

* WHERE...Shasta Lake Area / Northern Shasta County.

* WHEN...6 PM this evening to 7 AM Thursday.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Be prepared for reduced visibilities at
times.
properties.instruction:
A Winter Weather Advisory for snow means periods of snow will
cause primarily travel difficulties. Be prepared for snow covered
roads and limited visibilities, and use caution while driving. The
latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be
obtained by calling 5 1 1.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO 7 AM PST THURSDAY ABOVE 3500 FEET
